title: Don't ask 'How much do you make?' on a date—use these 7 questions instead to reveal their 'financial mindset'
summary_full: "Start with these questions that invite real answers, stories, preferences, and patterns," says Douglas Boneparth, CFP, president and founder of Bone Fide Wealth.
summary_public: "Start with these questions that invite real answers, stories, preferences, and patterns," says Douglas Boneparth, CFP, president and founder of Bone Fide Wealth.
